programme.title: Mi Wu Ci Sha
programme.desc: The daughter of a late great general embarks on a journey for revenge when she discovers that the mastermind to the murder of her biological father is her foster father, the Prime Minister.

programme.title: The Strange Beast Of Silent Island
programme.desc: Married couple Ye Bo Ming and Yi Lin are engaged in aquaculture on a remote island. During her cousin's visit, a strange bloodthirsty beast trapped in a mine is accidentally released.

programme.title: The Drunken Prodigy
programme.desc: A spoiled young man with a passion for martial arts loses his entire fortune when he falls victim to a series of traps set by malicious gang while pursuing the top courtesan.

programme.title: Nine Colors Deer King
programme.desc: A strange disease has spread across Huanyi Village, prompting the guardian of the mountain Chang Sheng to find the legendary Nine-color Deer King to save the village.

programme.title: Wind Direction Ep10
programme.desc: The story of the Cheng family, who moved from the northwest to the coastal base of Heping Town, where three generations of their family works in the oilfield.

programme.title: Wind Direction Ep11
programme.desc: The story of the Cheng family, who moved from the northwest to the coastal base of Heping Town, where three generations of their family works in the oilfield.

programme.title: Rhapsody In Bathhouse
programme.desc: Waking up from a coma, a man unexpectedly finds himself back in the 1990s. He meets his young father, whom he'd always been ashamed of, but gradually begins to gain deeper understanding & insight.

programme.title: The Chi Dragon Slash
programme.desc: At the end of the Tang Dynasty, Navy General Qian Liu set off to exterminate the river pirates, only to discover a mystical two-headed beast called the Chi dragon in a cave.

programme.title: Ghost Mantis 2 Mutation
programme.desc: Entomologist Su Hao is kidnapped & forced to participate in splicing experiments. To halt the inhumane experiments, Su Hao fights in a life-and-death battle against the demonic leader.

programme.title: HAHAHAHAHA S5 Ep11
programme.desc: Led by Deng Chao, Chen He, Fan Zhi Yi, and Wang Mian, the "Five Ha" team travels through Xinjiang, Hainan, and Sichuan, blending comedy with local culture to showcase China's diverse folk traditions.

programme.title: Blade Of Fury
programme.desc: Pei Xing is famous for being an 'unkillable' & cold-blooded assassin. But after witnessing great injustice, his dormant chivalry gradually awakens and he decides to retaliate in kind.

programme.title: White Cat Legend Ep33
programme.desc: Starring Ding Yu Xi, Zhou Qi, Wei Zhe Ming and more. Li Bing, favored by the empress, becomes Deputy Chief. With allies, they defy fate and uphold justice in the divine capital.

programme.title: White Cat Legend Ep34
programme.desc: Starring Ding Yu Xi, Zhou Qi, Wei Zhe Ming and more. Li Bing, favored by the empress, becomes Deputy Chief. With allies, they defy fate and uphold justice in the divine capital.

programme.title: Lost Destiny
programme.desc: While journeying to take the imperial exam, scholar Pu Song Ling meets Su Xian, a nine-tailed fox spirit indebted to his kindness in their previous life.

programme.title: Guardian Of Graveyard
programme.desc: Treasure hunters Xun Ye, Feng Yao, Cai Qing Yun, Wang Ya Zi & others encounter various dangers as they seek treasure at Qinling Phoenix Mountain, even averting conspiracies & diplomatic issues.

programme.title: The Legend Of Man And Loong
programme.desc: The Huan Long family has lived with & fought alongside dragons since ancient times. However, after a betrayal, all the dragon kings were sealed into the Nine Dragon Wall.

programme.title: Hunt The Wicked
programme.desc: After multiple encounters & life-and-death games revolving the secrets of a mysterious & sinister city, brilliant detective Huang Mingjin & the genius criminal Wei Yunzhou join hands to punish evil.

programme.title: The Chi Dragon Slash
programme.desc: At the end of the Tang Dynasty, Navy General Qian Liu set off to exterminate the river pirates, only to discover a mystical two-headed beast called the Chi dragon in a cave.

programme.title: Seven Heroes Beat The Monster
programme.desc: To prevent the resurgence of the dreaded Wu Xiang, young You Xi sought to unite the Six Great Saints & unseal Sun Wukong, who unbeknownst to You Xi, was also sealed with Wu Xiang.

programme.title: Huang Jin Gui Shi Lu Film Series
programme.desc: With the influential sects at the brink of war, County Chief Lu instructs Chief Detective Duan Guang Long & siblings, Xue Xiao Feng & Xue Xiao Hua, to conduct a secret investigation on the matter.

programme.title: Detective Dee And The Punished Swellhead
programme.desc: When a mysterious curse causes people to undergo physical changes or be devoured by demonic beings, detective Dee is tasked with finding out the truth & to resolve the impossible curse.

programme.title: Wind Direction Ep12
programme.desc: The story of the Cheng family, who moved from the northwest to the coastal base of Heping Town, where three generations of their family works in the oilfield.

programme.title: Golden Trio Ep11
programme.desc: Three old friends with different personalities come together after a lifetime of hard work. In retirement, they overcome personal challenges and face the second half of their lives head-on.

programme.desc: Three old friends with different personalities come together after a lifetime of hard work. In retirement, they overcome personal challenges and face the second half of their lives head-on.
